title: Exquisite Emerald and Diamond Chowker - A Timeless Elegance
materials: Emeralds (Panna). Features Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting luster.
features: Intricate floral and vine motifs meticulously handcrafted in gold, enhanced by dazzling diamonds. The chowker features a stunning emerald centerpiece, with smaller emerald accents throughout. The design includes dangling golden beads, adding a touch of traditional flair. The pendant boasts a detachable emerald drop, adding versatility to this piece.
colors: beautifully contrasted by the deep green hues of the emeralds. A classic South Indian color palette signifying prosperity and auspiciousness.
occasions: and grand celebrations. Ideal for a Seemantham or any occasion where you want to exude timeless elegance.
description: This chowker is a testament to the skilled craftsmanship of our Hyderabad artisans. The high-quality diamonds and vivid emeralds create a captivating sparkle.
